desc: The Lowcountry's largest selection of handmade, solid wood Amish furniture for the bedroom, dining room, living room and office. Plus all-weather poly outdoor furniture, modern Italian leather upholstery, and customizable sofas made in the USA. Our expert team will help you personalize every aspect of your furniture.

layout.text: The Largest Amish Furniture Store in the Lowcountry
Handcrafted Amish hardwood furniture, Italian leather upholstery, and more high-quality pieces made throughout the USA
